rooms.name: Entrance
rooms.description: You are in the entrance of the dungeon.

rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description: You are in a dark corridor.

rooms.name: Chamber
rooms.description: There is a bed in the chamber. The pillows are soft.

3.name: A vending machine
3.description: The vending machine has a small slid for the coins. The display is too dirty to reveal what it sells.

1.name: A stack of gold
1.description: It consists for roughly some hundred shiny gold coins.

4.name: Bag of chips
4.description: The chips don't really look that bad, the smell however, suggests otherwise

1.name: Goblin
1.description: A small green goblin leans against a door to the north.

events.message: The bed is made of soft wood and has a comfortable mattress. Below the pillow you find a copper coin
Now that you have taken the coin, you glance down at an empty bed
The vending machine makes some concerning noice... but it works!
You would sure like to get more loot, however your only coin is now gone
The goblin doesn't seem to take much interest in you, but he sure does want those chips
